data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 38,491 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Bulandshahr.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bulandshahr, Uttar Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Bulandshahr to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Bulandshahr, Uttar Pradesh, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Bulandshahr.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Gadaria (Muslim traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Gadaria (Muslim traditions) people.
Father, please give the church in the county of Bulandshahr prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Bulandshahr, Uttar Pradesh, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bulandshahr, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 3,499,200.

We estimate Bulandshahr has 38,491 people who might know Jesus, 42,457 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,418,252 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Bulandshahr. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

location.name: Bulandshahr
location.people_groups_list: Jat Deswal, Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions), Brahmin Rikhisur, Faqir, Rajbhar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jat Deswal (74,000), Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions) (1,800), Brahmin Rikhisur (52,000), Faqir (90,000), Rajbhar (73,000)
